=== NEWS ARTICLE ===
Title: 14 Penny stocks surged up to 440% in CY25; 6 emerge as multibaggers. Did you own any?
Source: Economic Times - Markets
Published: 2025-12-28 04:38
Related Stocks: LT
Categories: markets

Summary:
In CY25, select penny stocks delivered sharp gains of up to 440%, with several emerging as multibaggers, highlighting strong momentum in low-priced micro-cap stocks despite elevated risks.

Sentiment: positive
